line.text: My love is strengthened though more weak in seeming
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I love not less though less the show appear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That love is merchandized whose rich esteeming
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The owner tongue doth publish every where
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Our love was new and then but in the spring
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When I was wont to greet it with my lays
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As Philomel in summer front doth sing
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And stops her pipe in growth of riper days
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Not that the summer is less pleasant now
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than when her mournful hymns did hush the night
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But that wild music burthens every bough
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And sweets grown common lose their dear delight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Therefore like her I sometime hold my tongue
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Because I would not dull you with my song
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
